queryDetail.value: SELECT DISTINCT PUB_a_cost_centre.a_cost_centre_code_c AS CostCentreCode, PUB_a_cost_centre.a_cost_centre_name_c FROM PUB_a_cost_centre WHERE PUB_a_cost_centre.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_cost_centre.a_cost_centre_code_c = "{{param_ledger_number_i}}00"
SELECT DISTINCT PUB_a_account.a_account_code_short_desc_c FROM PUB_a_account WHERE PUB_a_account.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_account.a_account_code_c = {AccountCode}

SELECT PUB_a_transaction.a_transaction_date_d AS Date, PUB_a_transaction.a_amount_in_base_currency_n AS Amount, PUB_a_transaction.a_debit_credit_indicator_l, PUB_a_transaction.a_narrative_c AS Detail, PUB_a_transaction.a_reference_c AS ReferenceNumber,
PUB_a_transaction.a_batch_number_i FROM PUB_a_transaction WHERE PUB_a_transaction.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_transaction.a_account_code_c = {AccountCode} AND PUB_a_transaction.a_cost_centre_code_c = {CostCentreCode} AND PUB_a_transaction.a_transaction_date_d BETWEEN {#param_from_date#} AND {#param_to_date#} AND PUB_a_transaction.a_transaction_status_l = true AND NOT (PUB_a_transaction.a_system_generated_l = true AND PUB_a_transaction.a_narrative_c LIKE "Year end re-allocation%")
UNION ALL
